titles.title: I Lift My Hands To The Coming King

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I lift my hands (I lift my hands)
To the coming King (to the coming King),
To the great I Am (To the great I Am),
To You I sing (to You I sing).
For You're the One that reigns within my heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I will serve no foreign god or any other treasure.
You are my heart's desire,
Your Spirit without measure
And to Your Name, I will bring my sacrifice.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alzo mis manos al Rey que viene,
Al gran Yo Soy, le canto hoy,
Porque eres Tú quien reinas en mi corazón.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
A otro dios no serviré, ningún otro tesoro.
Desea mi corazón tu Espíritu completo.
A Tu nombre sacrificios traeré.
